WRITING.TITLE: Dracule Mihawk origins and Pernament Haki theorie
WRITING.TEXT: Hello everyone , i recently started making OP theories on YouTube for fun. Theories i made so far are about Elemental powers of Vinsmokes , Assassination of Big Mom and the connection between Sanji , Germa 66 , Baroque works and Don Krieg Pirates. If you are interested in them my name is TubeBeky on youtube Last few days i have been doing a big theory on Dracule Mihawk origins and his Pernament Haki. Now , i wanted to hear opinion of you guys before i make the video , cause the theory is pretty big and has a lot of info and i don't want to make it unless i am 100% shure in it. I will copy the theory and please do share any suggestion , critic on it. Dracule Mihawk is one of the strongest characters in OP universe and he holds the title of the Greatest swordsman. But how did he achieve those feats is not known to us readers. I did some detective work and i found some cool stuff that might connect the dots. There will be a lot of information in the start. When i am talking about Dracule not Dracula , i will call him Mihawk to avoid confusion, Let's start from his name and looks. His first name Dracule is based on the name Dracula and as we know Dracula is the strongest vampire. Name Dracula is translated into The son of Devil or Dragon. Mihawk and Dracula have two things in common beside the name , they are both very pale and they live in a big misty castle. His last name is also simbolic for Mihawk due to eye sight and religion. As we all know , Mihawk has Christian thematic going on around him ( because of the crosses ). If you are wondering what does Hawk have to do with Christianity... In early Christian symbolism, hooded hawk symbolized the Christian hoping in the Light of Christ even though surrounded by the darkness of this earth. And as we know , Mihawk allways wears a big hat , that makes him a hodded hawk! Before we move to his powers , i suggest you read this part of the theorie once more so that you don't get lost. His past has a lot of common with his name. I believe Mihawk sold his soul to the devil in order to become the greatest swordsman in the world ( same way Dracula sold his soul to the devil for power ). If Dracula means Son of the Devil , that would make Mihawk is the son of the devil cause he sold his soul to him. Same power came in the form of his sword but that will be explained in the pernament haki part of the video. That would explain his pale skin , he has no soul so his body feels very much empty , dead you can say. Remember the misty castle he lives in? Dracula also lives in the misty castle and one of the powers Dracula has is to turn into MIST. Ibet you Mihawk sold the soul to the Devil same as Dracula ,but , 12 years before we are at now in OP , Shanks lost his arm and Mihawk stopped fighting him , this made Mihawk regret the deal he made with the devil because he has no one to fight now. So now , Mihawk is looking for a way out , and that way out can be explained by his last name and him teaching Zoro ! In OP , main drink is Sake , but can you remember what was Mihawk drinking when Zoro came to him? He was drinking red wine. Red Wine is what connects his first name and the last name. Red wine for Mihawk can be looked at as blood for Dracula. And regarding his last name, red wine has a big simbolic meaning in Christian religion , same as Hawk. Because Mihawk is regreting his deal with the devil , he decide to do something good with the power he has so he joined WG to hunt down evil pirates. Combine that with the meaning of the Hawk in the Christian religion and you truly get that Mihawk is the hooded hawk ! He is surrounded by the darkness ( pirates , deal with the devil ) but he has hope to find a way out of that and they way out of that is hunting down pirates and making Zoro the man that will kill him and end his curse ! Regarding pernament Haki , like i said , i believe the power Mihawk got from the devil is given to him in the form of his sword , Yoru. His sword is one of the legendaries , it is quite big and it has a black blade. But despite that Mihawk said an interesting line to Zoro once , and the line goes : Without subtlety , sword is but an iron bar. What Mihawk said was , if you can't understand your sword , it's nothing but a piece of iron. I believe he was refering to the curse or the spirit of his sword. Because Mihawk can understand his sword he can unleash his full strenght. But you are asking what does that have to do with pernament haki? Mihawk or rather his sword is feeding himself with the haki of others. Each time Mihawk kills someone or cuts him, his sword or rather devil inside the sword takes the spirit ( Haki ) of the person and fuses it into the sword. Mihawk fought a lot of people in his past to achieve his goal and the people he fought were strong people who wanted the same title , each time he defeated someone his power grew and grew in power. That is how he achieved his goal
Care to explain? I would live to hear why not

And? Why not , we know that curse swords exist and that they hold a secret power in them. It was stated that curses make people mad and users of the sword with a curse tend to die. I believe if you are not worthy of a sword and its curse, sword will reject you, if you are worthy it will give you insane power for a price
It's fine , i knew this would happen , but yea , at least say why you don't agree with the theory
Shit , i will be proud if someone remembers this after 2 days not 4 years lmao

WRITING.TITLE: Massive theory/spoiler for a possible war to come in next few chapters.
WRITING.TEXT: I don't have time to make a video for this theory so why not post it here for a civil discussion Vinsmokes and Big Mom don't have a stable relationship currently. Tension and hate is there and it only takes a single spark to start a war between them. Judge said that the only reason he brought back Sanji was to marry him off to Big Mom because he hates the thought of Ichiji , Niji , Yonji or Reiju to be in the spot that Sanji is right now. Luffy doesn't have an army to fight of Big Mom and Vinsmokes , but there is a way for him to fight them off. I bet that we will see a lot of familiar faces at the Tea Party , some of them who were once or are currently allied to Luffy. For start , Jimbei is there with his crew ready to jump in and help Luffy out. We might even see Crocodile. Those people will be the army Luffy needs to fight in this arc, but even with the help of Jimbei and people who are there , will it be enough? NO. Numbers are still not in favour of Luffy, but... We know that Big Mom has a box from Fishman island which has a bomb in it , and with the gift exchange moment coming soon, it makes room for a crazy outcome. If Big Mom gives that box to Vinsmokes and the bomb goes off in the hand of a Germa member , Judge will see that as an act of war and he will order his troops to attack the island. Germa has a big enough fleet and an army to fight against Big Mom and this war will make a chance for Luffy and his allies to save Sanji , kick some ass and escape. How will they save Sanji? WRITING.TITLE: Kaido and 3 calamities are the reincarnation of 4 horsemen of the apocalypse. HUGE theory and Massive spoiler allert.
WRITING.TEXT: In the recent interview with Oda there was an interesting picture of his workplace http://apforums.net/showthread.php?t=42229 amp;page=22 amp;p=3663999 amp;viewfull=1#post3663999 Here is the link to the interview , picture you need is the third one which reveals that there is a paper which says, "Kaidou, King, Queen, Jack". Now i was doing some brainstorming on the OP reddit and by myself and i came up with an amazing theory which i think you will join. Now , we know that 3 calamities are Kaidos strongest warriors and by looking at the recent info we got it is safe to say that the names of the 3 calamities are King , Queen and Jack which is not a big suprise since there are a lot of theories that Kaido and his army are based on cards. *Next card is Ace , and when i think of Ace i think of a flying Ace so i think Ace in Kaidos army will have a Bird Zoan.* *You also have X Drake who is allied with Kaido and he is the number 10 card.* So much for that part of the theory so i will move on to 3 calamities powers. Ok , so we have 3 calamities and Kaido. **I believe they were made to represent 4 horsemen of the apocalypse in OP world.** **Horseman/ Calamity of War** is represented by Kaido since he wants to start the biggest war that the world has ever seen. I am in the camp that Kaido has a **Dragon Smile.** **Horseman/ Calamity of Famine** is represented by **Jack.** His name **The Drought** is the best evidence for this and as we know he has **Mammoth Devil Fruit.** **Horseman/ Calamity of Pestilence** is represented by the **Queen.** Her name could be **Queen the Sickness** and options for her DF power are various. If you wanna go for the Ancient Zoans theme you have **Pulmonoscorpius.** Pulmonoscorpius was a GIANT Scorpion who was quite dangerous in his time and he had a very strong venom. If you don't wanna go that road, she can have a **Mosquito or Plague Rat devil fruit.** **Horseman/ Calamity of Death** is represented by the **King.** His name could be **King The Reaper** and i believe his DF will be that of **Xenosmilus ( Sabertooth ).** He was quite dangerous and a brutal hunter in his time. **And that would be all , sorry if i had any spelling errors , English ain't my main language. Be shure to share this and discuss !**

Characters are still young but full of potential. AWESOME powers and fights. If you think about trying it , don't compare it to Naruto like most people did. **Vinland Saga** -- gt; Not your usual manga. It has a very serious tone to it. It is about war and politics in Viking age , exploring America and much more. If you are into more "adult" type manga , give it a try. WRITING.TITLE: After reading Bakuman , my respect for Manga authors skyrocketed.
WRITING.TEXT: For those who don't know what Bakuman is , it is a story from an author who made Death Note ( i think it is the same dude ) about 2 friends trying to get their manga published in WSJ. One of them does the art while the other one does the story. Story shows how much it is hard to be a mangaka and how much sacrifice you have to make in order to make it big, something i never managed to grasp even tho i heard a lot of stories about certain authors and their troubles. I always respected manga authors but this story made me appreciate manga even more. I am having though times in my life now due to accumulated depression and reading manga just makes my head empty. I highly recommed that you give Bakuman a try , even if you already have huge amounts of respect towards mangakas this story is just awesome

WRITING.TITLE: Off meta decks which are viable but MSG Meta won't allow them
WRITING.TEXT: It ain't no brainer that the current Meta is not very open to new decks , which a dam shame considering that there are a lot of cool decks you could do. I tried creating some decks which are kinda off meta and they did perform well until i met meta decks ( mostly thinking about Pirate decks here ) , so i thought i share the idea with you all if someone wants to try them and have fun Old Gods Kazakus Priest - Sounds stupid but it works , and it works well. Your goal here is to play a minion heavy game and control the board with your removals. Your finisher is the C'thun , you can add a Doomcaller to get an another shot at C'thun lethal in the end game if you are forced to use C'thun "early". Kazakus here has 2 options , either you go for a removal/revive or revive/health bonus. Why revive? Because most of the cards you will play are good minions so you are destined to revive something good. Cyromancer Mage - My fav. This will break you opponent mentally. Everything here is freeze and you should focus cards which can give you more freeze mechanics juice. Water E. is there to shit on weapons , frostbolts to screw with early aggression , Nova + Doom for extra removal , Shatter is godlike , go for freeze minions and ofc some secrets for extra defense with that cards which costs 2 less for each secret you played . If you have room add Pyroblast for a quick finish. It is a dam shame meta is like this now since there so many cool decks to be tried and played. I highly suggest you try Cyromancer , you will have so much fun freezing the aggro

I expect cards that will buff Elementals , but for now , 10 mana 10/10 seems boring. I doesn't have to be my idea , that was just an example. And you can also deal with his rattle pretty nicely even with Entomb and some other card getting removed

WRITING.TITLE: For a F2P game that earns millions every year i would like to see a campaign mode and Daily Log-in rewards.
WRITING.TEXT: I am sure that the majority of players won't ask for free packs , free gold or free arena tickets but rather that you give the game some more content so that they feel ok to give the game money later down the road. We give you money even if we don't need to but in most cases we get nothing. **How about a campaign mode?** Lore of Warcraft is so rich on its own and when you add the card game platform you can have something really awesome. Make a story and when a player clears a level reward him based on how fast he did it and how well he did it. **This way you can give new player a far more better way to earn cards and gold rather than them wasting gold left and right and hope for the best** **What about Daily Log- In rewards?** How about giving rewards to the players who play your game everyday and give it fuel to be alive ? **They don't have to be crazy , do it something like 100 dust first day , 40 gold second day , 200 dust third day , 75 gold fourth day , 400 dust fifth day , 100 gold sixth day and a free pack of any choice on the seventh day. Seems balanced right?** **But why stop there? How about better achievement system? Dust re balance so that one legendary doesn't equal one rare card? All of these things are basic stuff for online video games. And when i see a F2P game that makes millions without this stuff , it makes me sick how much some people can be greedy in this world and how stupid we are to give more money just because we love the game and lore that we grew up with**

Just because the game is doing good doesn't mean you can't improve it to be better. If the game is doing good it is doing good because players keep it alive , why not reward those players here and then with better content to show your tanks instead of raising the price of packs and making the game even hard for some people?

I gave Gwent , Elder Scrolls card game and Shadowverse and try until the new rotation hits and all i can is wow. Those game nailed it when it comes to the content and giving its player base rewards for doing good. If Blizzard keeps doing this greedy tactic they will sure start to bleed and if it bleeds , we can kill it
Holly crap i didn't know about this , this is awesome ! A good thing to do for the player base so that they don't feel abandoned

WRITING.TITLE: Why aren't there more Priest Quest players?
WRITING.TEXT: I can't remember the last time i had this much playing HS or Priest in general. Priest was always my fav class but i never played Dragon Priest simply because it was boring. But since Un'Goro hit i see maybe 1-2 Priest players per day and sometimes not even that much which is a dam shame. Priest is super fun and viable now. I.came up with this deck and so far i love it. Here is the picture of it if someone is interested in playing it http://i.imgur.com/1It1nsK.png , If you have any question do ask them

Well i would disagree on that. Only deck i have problems with is Quest Rouge. Against all other decks i do well unless they have a crazy opening hand when i have nothing. This deck has Agro Tools and Control Tools. Also since this meta is focused on strong cards you are bound to steal something really good
Getting Ice Block against Exodia mage is Godlike

Token Druid doesn't do well against this deck because you have a lot of Agro Tools early on. You can trade pretty efficiently and come on top. That is why V. Elemental and Tar Creepers. Taunt warrior is a coin flip. That deck is made of removals and good cards overall so you are bound to get something good with each steal. Exodia Mage goes in favour of the Mage unless you get Ice Block. And that is not hard to get if you consider that Exodia games go into fatigue and you are bound to play majority of your "copy" minions. But then again Exodia Mage can just destroy any deck but Priest at least has a way of preventing that. Shaman just gets steamrolled , i didn't lose a single game to a Shaman. But this deck is weak to Rouge and it is also weak to Paladin. But no one plays Paladin so there is that

A 2 drop that will always trade for 2 minions is quite strong agaubst agro. Tar Creeper is just insane against agro , it is pretty much 3 mana give a middle finger. You can hide behind taunts that you get T. Shieldraiser and I. Tauren. Misters of Mixtures is there to heal you enough until you get your quest and when you do get your quest it is just GG against any agro deck.

WRITING.TITLE: So i just finished Andromeda...
WRITING.TEXT: I played Andromeda when it came out first and i stopped playing it because it was just... pain in the ass to play... and i didn't touch it until this week where i finished it from top to bottom. So there are few things that struck me in Andromeda that i wanna hear your take on. 1. I am pretty sure the Benefactor is Illusive man and that he killed Jien Garson so that she doesn't spill the beans on Reapers. I think this plot point will become relevant in the second part and that Cerberus will play a big role in it. I wouldn't even be suprised if Illusive man cloned himself like he did to Sheppard and traveled to Andromeda. So yea i expect Cerberus to play a role in next Andromeda. 2. Kett , oh boy. I personally feel that Ryder can't stand against them at this point. So i can't really see them being the major enemy in the second part. Someone has to fill that spot instead 3. I believe that outside of Heleus cluster there is a faction that can rival Kett. I just hope Andromeda isn't only Kett as a superpower. 4. Creator of Remnants - Now this is the best part of Andromeda for me. We know there were 2 superpowers before the events of Andromeda. You had the creator of Remnants and Angara and then you had their enemies that forced them to hide the Meridium and leave Heleus cluster. I believe the enemy in the second part will be the enemies of Jardaan and you will have Jardaan as your allies if they are not dead at this point. The plot line of the Scourge has to be resolved 5. Milky Way and Andromeda - I think it is a must that Andromeda makes contact with the Milky Way. And someone from Shepards old crew would be present then. If i am not mistaken Liara should be alive and Grunt too. 6. Quarians and Batarians - I expect them to make a return in Andromeda - yea Batarians too 7. Tann needs to die 8. Mother of Ryder - I think she will have a strong plot point in second part or third. Makes no sense to keep her alive if not

Yea i found out yestrday. I think it is a complete waste considering end of Andromeda left a lot of room for improvement and that aspect of original trilogy i liked a lot was present in Andromeda and it could be uplifted much more

gt; Think about it, even if somebody spiled the beans on the Reapers it wouldn't affect anybody in Andromeda much, i dont think that is why Gerson was killed. gt; gt; For me it makes sense because Illusive man didn't want people to know that their families might be dead. He didn't want the people in Andromeda feel despair more than they already did when they hit the scourge. gt; I think the "Jardaan" are people from the Milky Way, notice how the Angaran and the Remnants only started cropping up 400 years ago? That was 200 years after the Initiative left Milky Way and 200 years after the Reapers war. Within 200 years especially if we go with the Synthesis or Control ending it is totally possible for the Milky Way species to advance their technology to reach Andromeda faster and prepare for the Initiative's arrival. gt; gt; I did think about this and the only reason why is would say no is that the Jardaan made Angara because that species is the one that can survive in Heleus. If it were humans or any Milky way galaxy they would just create Humans or Turians or Krogan or Salarian. But Jardaan made Angara , so i believe Jardaan are like what Kett are to Angara but not in a bad way.

WRITING.TITLE: Ashe brings me hope for the future of Overwatch
WRITING.TEXT: The last 2 seasons and the current one i was struggling to play Overwatch. As a main tank i gave my all to get out of mid Platinum and i managed to reach 3400 SR last season. I climbed around 800 SR in total with Orissa, D.va and Winston and i ended up with above 60% winrate at the end of the season with them That being said i also raged like a mother***** at every chain CC that hit me. Each day i spent an hour in quickmatch just trying to learn new tricks and improve overall skill. Which in the end wouldn't mather because someone picked Brig or Doomfist. At the start of this season i started doing placements and i am 5 wins and 4 defeats... and i can't muster anymore energy to continue. I simply lost flavour for the game. But after seeing Ashe i somewhat have hope that Overwatch will improve vastly in the future and that the game will move away from CC chain and one shots to something better. i srsly do hope the games takes a turn for better because i simply love the concept of OW and the lore and i wanna be the part of it without bashing my head after each game

WRITING.TITLE: State of Soldier 76
WRITING.TEXT: Ever since Overwatch came out i was a huge Soldier 76 fan. His lore, his character, personality and everything regarding him is awesome to me. That being said i never actually started to play Soldier until last 2 seasons reason being i was more comfortable playing tanks and supports. During season 12 i decided to give my all and climb as much as i can which resulted in me doing a climb from 2500 to 3450-3500 when i stopped. I stopped because i was drained and i couldn't press the button to play ranked. I was burned out. So because i wasn't able to play ranked i started playing Quick Play and Arcade to mess around with my friends and while i was playing QP and Arcade i started to play more and more of Soldier and Hanzo. The more i played those two the more i noticed just how much those 2 are different in hero kit yet so alike in their roles. It got to the point where i would ask myself: Why should i play Soldier 76 when Hanzo can do everything he can much better? So i wanna dedicate this thread to adress the state of Soldier 76 and i will break down his character from top to bottom. 1. Soldier is a veteran, modified to be perfect soldier in all of aspects yet his character in game is the definition of a rookie soldier. Soldier can only hip fire with full auto. No Semi-Auto mode or aim down sight mode. Nothing which makes a soldier better than a rookie one. Because of it i think Soldier 76 should have the option to have 2 fire modes. Semi Auto and Full Auto which he can change with a press of a button. And just like Ashe he should have the option to aim down sights if needed. Anyone who played FPS will know just how much semi auto and full auto make a difference in certain situations. Same with being able to hip fire or aim down sights. Each of these 4 modes has his ups and down that change depending on the situation you are in and as such enabling this to Soldier 76 would open so much more possibilities to him. 2. Soldier 76 is 50% being able to aim and 50% being able to position properly. As such Blizzard gave him the ability tosprint to position better. But that ability lacks so so much on certain maps where Soldier has to sprint ridicolus amounts of distance to reach his desired spot from which he can fire on enemies. By doing so he makes himself open for enemy fire and he is also loosing valuable time. Now compare this to Hanzo, Widowmaker and Ashe who all have tools to position better that are much better than Soldiers. That being said i really believe Soldier 76 should have the ability to climb low to medium size walls and obstacles without him needing to use Rocket Jump which is insane to me. Why should Soldier use an ability that has 8 seconds cooldown and which isn't even created to make him position better? Can you imagine if you used Storm Arrows to position better as Hanzo? And when you rockets to position you also take damage and now you have 8 seconds cooldown on an ability that might be of use to you. 3. When it comes to Helix Rockets it is a high risk high reward ability. It is often used on tanks to remove armor and then attack them to avoid reduced damage buff armor provides. It is rarely used on squishy targets because it is often hard to hit them and because of it most Soldier players target the ground. I personally think that when it comes to Helix Rockets they should be reworked to be more like Junkrat Bombs. Soldier 76 can stack 3 rockets which refill after acertain amount of time and can be used at any time he wishes to use them. That being said they would do reduced damage in order to prevent Soldier 76 to be pre nerf Storm Arrow Hanzo. 4. Biotic Field for me doesn't suit Soldier 76 at all. It is designed to be a group heal ability but when you think about it most Soldier 76 players are on the high ground and in very few istances will they be grouped with their team. It is often used to self heal when dived. Problem is that if you are dived as Soldier you can fight of 1 enemy , 2 or more not so much and you will be forced to retreat. Now what's the point of BF there? There is non. You will throw the ground but you will be forced to retreat. I think Soldier 76 should instead be given an ability called Adrenaline Shot where he for few seconds gets a regen and damage reduction ( 10 to 15 % is enough ). It is much better for Soldier 76 when it comes to his playstyle. 5. Visor for me should be totally reworked. It is such a low skill level ability which is often countered by Rein simply keeping his shield up or any Support just pressing Q. The only time Visor is good is to clean up enemies and even then it is risky since you make yourself a moving target just screaming: Yea i am using my ult. As such i would make Visor to be more skilled based by making it so that Visor is no longer a LIDL aimbot. I would make it so that Visor instead scans targets in the area revealing their weak points which Soldier can then shoot for extra damage. Make it more about skill. #8203; For anyone who read all of this thanks a lot. Sorry for bad English. For those who don't wanna read the entire thing i got you, here is TL: DR 1. Soldier should have Semi Auto mode and Aim Down sights mode 2. He should be able to climb low to medium high walls 3. Helix Rockets should be like Junk Bombs but would deal less damage. 4. BF should be made into Adrenaline Shot where Soldier gets self regen and damage reduction 5. Visor should be made into a mode where he can see enemy weak spots that when hit deal extra damage.
People are using Cree ult to reset ammo yet Soldier when ults can't even do that. Which makes Cree wasting his ult be even better than Soldier using his ult. So much Pepega

WRITING.TITLE: Quirk of Destro - Power of Words
WRITING.TEXT: So this is something i've been thinking off for a long time now when it comes to Destro and his quirk. #8203; In the recent chapter we learned that the Liberation Army has a little over 100 000 members and we also learned that the number of copies the book sold is also above 100 000 copies. I find that number way too convenient. #8203; My idea is that Destro had some kind of a quirk that can influence people and he used that quirk on his book hence why the number of Liberation army members is close to the number of copies sold. #8203; I am not sure which would the conditions be considering CEO-Nose-Kun killed his assistant who also read the book but didn't find it interesting. #8203; This leads me to believe some of the conditions for the Destro's quirk to take action is to either read the book from top to finish or at least agree with it somewhat. #8203; Now you might ask yourself is this possible since he is dead , wouldn't his quirk stop working? I think it wouldn't stop working since he already placed his quirk - same as if Todoroki was to die his ice wouldn't just disappear #8203; TLDR : Considering the number of Liberation army members and the copies sold of Destro's book i think Destro had a quirk that helped him influence people in some way.
That could be the case but i am iffy on it just because of the number of soldiers and the number of copies sold. It seems very specific like it is a work of enemy STAND.

WRITING.TITLE: A Warhammer Age of Sigmar RTS is coming from Elite Dangerous developer Frontier
Teclis needs a rework
WRITING.TEXT: I love Teclis. He is by far the most interesting Legendary lord for me in the game. Starting in a place where you can fight Lizardmen, Vampire Coast, Skaven, Dark Elves, Humans, Dwarfes and Orcs i so unique its incredible. I played so far 3 big campaigns with him i noticed one glaring flaw he has - he just has too much stuff to level up and his faction buffs are weak For me what makes a great legendary lord is his focus tree that is rich but simple. Perfect example would be Malekith. Malekith has rich skill tree that is simple yet strong. Teclis on other hand has a big clumsy skill tree you will rarely see fully filled. Lets do some math. First you lvl up campaign skills and you need to sink 11 points in it. Then 4 points in army buffs to upgrade your archers bcs archers are you spine of the army - 15 points so far. You are 16 levels in and you just now are starting to get into Tecli's magic for which he is known for Teclis Magic - You need flames of phoenix bcs it is such a broken spell it would be waste not to get it. Every run i had i always used that spell and Teclis would easily have 500 kills per fight. 7 more points, 22 so far You wanna get a mount bcs spellcasters need to be mobile - 23 points Sublime focus - 5 more points - 28 in total And now you can maybe finally finish army buff skill tree - 6 more points, 34 in total You might wanna grab reduced upkeep - 37 points in total. And finally you have 3 points left if my math is correct Teclis needs A LOT of points. And unless you are farming rebellions or sacking for exp like a mad man you will rarely get that many points. And even if you do opt to farm exp you will spend like 20-30 turns doing so while most factions declare war on you. His faction buffs are weak. While +5 rank for mages is nice the 10 diplo relations with men and elves is pointless. 30 winds of magic is amazing but fireball is meh since teclis can't fly at all so fireball has a very likely chance to miss or not be in LoS. So basically you only have +5 rank for mages and 30 extra WoM. Compare that to other legendary heroes and it is obv how much Teclis is lacking. He doesn't even have increased capacity for mages or the ability to recruit them early on. In my opinion Teclis should have following buffs - not every from the list but some Ability to recruit mages early on and increased capacity for them Increased experience gain for mages - or reduced upkeep. Reduced upkeep for all Loremaster units. Double skill point gain per level If you wanna make Teclis this ultimate mage ( which he his ) then he should have buffs than enable him so

WRITING.TEXT: Very hard across the board. Mods nothing special , more legendary lord items and graphics changes

I have over 1.1k hours on TWH2 and most of it is on Empire so i know my shit when it comes to Empire. GS in this situation were massively buffed by karl franz and tech plus experience. Them going up against weak beastmen infantry is piece of cake when covered by mages and handgunners. Handgunners were on a high ground above GS heavily protected and they had free shots entire fight. Reiksguard that took most damage were MVP since their job was to hunt Cygors and Minotraurs due to their Anti Large buff Karl Franz gives. I never allowed them to reach my front line otherwise my front line that held a horde after horde would def collapse Karl Franz and Warrior priest were on containment duty. Go in there and draw big chunks of enemies towards you to relieve pressure on GS. Franz had more luck since he was massive and had regen trait from Isabella while WP took some heavy hitting. Shadow mage used Pit of Shades every time beastmen regrouped on GS line. I never really allowed beastmen to fully engage my line bcs i know while i have quality they have quantity and i always need to make sure my front line isn't overwhelmed. Now, if you don't wanna believe it fine. I can always send you a save game file

No joke his advice is lowkey good. Handgunners often can't shoot above your infantry and you need to utilize high ground ( which you won't awalys have ) or flanking ( And risk your handgunners being rushed or not be able to shoot what you want due to range and obscure vision) . Crossbows, archers and huntsman are fine and all but when dealing with large mob groups they lack damage. Outriders with GL tho. They will shred any infantry to pieces and disrupt mobs. They can't have obscure vision like HG since they shoot above your infantry. Their speed allows them to reposition fast if necessary or escape dangerous situations. Fuck it, time for another Empire campaign

But if you play Empire chances are you will fight Vampires - Skaven - Orcs - Norsca - Beastmen more than you will fight Chaos or any other high armor enemies. And even if you fight Empire they don't have that much armored units - GS and cav are only ones i think? All the rest will get shred by Outriders And while other races you fight have armored units they mostly use low armor ones from my experience ( I have yet to see Skaven go high armor same as Vampires or Norsca. Orcs are most likely to go armor )

I'm really hopping Wood Elves get Stalking movement mechanic
WRITING.TEXT: After buying Wood Elves DLC bcs of the incoming update and trying to play Wood Elves i see a glaring problem with them. Wood Elves not having Stalk mechanic makes no sense considering their playstyle. Wood Elves don't have a big economy meaning they have to be careful with how many units their recruit. Considering the buffs Wood Elves get for Missile units and their economy means you will wanna maximize the potential of your army. That means you will depend on Glade Guard quite a bit until you get your economy rolling since they are best units cost wise and buffs wise. With that in mind having no stalk option is bonkers to me when someone like Alith Anar has it who has almost identical playstyle as Wood Elves - Weak Economy and reliance on Archers. In fact Alith Anar is ever stronger than Wood Elves considering his archers are on the level of Waywatchers and you get 50% upkeep on em plus your economy is way better bcs High Elves So in my opinion Wood Elves should get stalking mechanic bcs their playstyle would be just so much better with them.
